hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to the #Goron Ruby#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #a Shadow Temple Small Key# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #inside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Bottom of the Well# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path of #the hero#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Market Potion Shop#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #cow behind webs# in a grotto gifts #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the castle guards' routes have major security vulnerabilities.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##the Haunted Wasteland## has #1# major item.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #2# major items.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #spider in the wasteland# holds #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that plundering #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is a foolish choice.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: Save your future, end the Happy Mask Salesman.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Shadow Temple Small Key# can be found #outside Ganon's Castle#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 3 Top

LH (Lab).text: They say that #a Shadow Temple Small Key# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that in the #crater, a spider in a crate and a single scrub# guard...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #spider behind webs# in a grotto holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides a grotto full of #spider webs#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #a Shadow Temple Compass# and #a Bottom of the Well Compass#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

SFM (Saria).text: Did you know that ReDead eat their defeated friends?

ToT (Left).text: They say that #a Game Key# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides #Mido's house#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals #3 Deku Scrubs#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that if you don't use your slingshot at all when you play the slingshot minigame, the owner gets upset with you.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #a Forest Temple Small Key# can be found at #Zora's River#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #6# major items.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of #the hero#.
